partners.name: IIT Mandi
partners.description: Partnered with IIT Mandi, Shivalik College of Engineering offers:
highlights: IIT-integrated specialization programs in Data Science and IoT (Internet of Things)
Guidance and mentorship from IIT experts
Advanced learning environment of IIT Mandi

partners.name: IIT Ropar
partners.description: Shivalik College of Engineering, in partnership with IIT Ropar, offers:
highlights: B. Tech specialization course in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Curriculum designed by IITians, covering core concepts, including machine learning, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, and AI ethics
Opportunities for research collaborations, projects, and internships with IIT Ropar

partners.name: IIT Roorkee
partners.description: In collaboration with IIT Roorkee, Shivalik College of Engineering offers:
highlights: An industry-aligned specialization program in AI & Deep Learning
Syllabus, designed by IITians, offers real-world applications with a strong focus on experiential learning
Benefits like a campus-immersion program, training programs led by IITians, and opportunities for research collaborations

partners.name: Larsen & Toubro EduTech LTD
partners.description: In collaboration with L&T EduTech LTD, Shivalik College of Engineering offers:
highlights: Future-focused programs in engineering & management courses
Focus on emerging technologies, including Digital Manufacturing, Semiconductor Design, AI&ML, FinTech, and Business Analytics
Benefits like L&T-facilitated placements, guidance from L&T experts, and a cutting-edge curriculum
